params.collateralAmount: The collateral amount to be added to the loan (overwritten by msg.value if collateral token is ETH)

returns.totalCollateralAmount: The total collateral amount after adding collateral

params.depositAmount: Deposit amount (overwritten by msg.value if deposit token is ETH)

returns.withdrewAmount: Total amount withdrew, not including interest

params.loanId: ID that identifies the loan record

getMaxLoanTerm().details: Remove documentation of return parameters in order to compile

params.liquidateAmount: The amount requested to liquidate. If the amount        is greater than the remaining debt of the loan, it will        liquidate the full remaining debt.        (overwritten by msg.value if loan token is ETH)

returns.liquidatedAmount: The amount of debt that is liquidated.
returns.remainingCollateral: The remaining amount of collateral after liquidation

params.collateralAmount: Amount to collateralize (overwritten by msg.value if collateral token is ETH)

params.repayAmount: Amount to repay (overwritten by msg.value if loan token is ETH)

params.collateralAmount: The collateral amount to be subtracted from the loan

returns.totalCollateralAmount: The total collateral amount after subtracting collateral

setLoanAndCollateralTokenPair(address,ad.notice: Set a loan and collateral token pair, e.g., ETH_DAI.
